additional_info.hometown_story: Karachi, the city of lights, has been a hub of culture and innovation for Hamza. Growing up here, Hamza developed a keen interest in technology and adventure, inspired by the vibrant energy and diverse experiences the city offers.
community_involvement: Active member of the Karachi Tech Meetups, organizing events and workshops for local tech enthusiasts.
Volunteer mentor for the Coding for Kids program, teaching programming skills to young learners.
Contributor to open-source projects related to AI and machine learning.
